definition: an angry stare, look angry or sullen, wrinkle one's forehead, as if to signal disapproval
details:
noun
- an angry stare
= synonyms: glare
verb
- look angry or sullen, wrinkle one's forehead, as if to signal disapproval
= synonyms: lower, frown, lour
- look at with a fixed gaze
= synonyms: glare
